titles.title: A bill to designate Sandoval County, Valencia County, and Torrance County, New Mexico as the new Southwest Border High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area counties.
A bill to designate Sandoval County, Valencia County, and Torrance County, New Mexico as the new Southwest Border High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area counties.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Includes Sandoval,Valencia, and Torrance counties, New Mexico, in the Southwest Border High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area under the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program of the Office of National Drug Control Policy.
